about_the_game:
Premise




In "Iridescent" you step into the shoes of Kruk, a long time member of the Astel family, renowned healers entrusted with perilous missions. Tasked with curing a devastating plague that transforms people into beasts or madmen, Kruk soon discovers that this affliction is merely a symptom of a world teetering on the brink of destruction. Beeing seemingly the only one who is willing to try, he embarks on a odyssey through the whole world to acquire the cure.

Gameplay




Venture forth into a sprawling world brimming with diverse characters and hidden secrets waiting to be unearthed. Traverse through intricate dungeons, each presenting its own set of unique challenges and items that unlock new areas and mysteries to explore. But beware, for formidable adversaries lurk around every corner, testing your mettle and resolve. Death comes easy to those who dare danger without caution.

Combat




Combat in "Iridescent" is a test of skill and precision. Embrace the art of parrying to deflect enemy attacks while sneaking your own attacks in between, gradually chipping away at their stagger bar until its filled and you can unleash a powerful grapple attack that inflicts massive damage. Boss battles are dynamic and intense, with adversaries evolving and adapting their tactics as the fight unfolds, keeping you on your toes until the very end.

Demo




Get a taste of the world of 'Iridescent' with my demo! Dive into the first two levels of the game to experience the intense combat, intricate dungeon exploration, and epic boss battles. Then, after completing the demo, test your skills further by facing off against two optional foes, offering a little glimpse of the challanges in the full game. Don't miss this chance to preview the excitement of 'Iridescent' and prepare for the full adventure!
